==German== ===Etymology=== {{compound|de|wo|hin}} ===Adverb=== {{de-adv}} # Where to, [[whither]] #: '''''Wohin''' geht ihr?'' -- "Where are you ''(pl., informal)'' going?" ====Antonyms==== * {{l|de|woher}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|dahin}} * {{l|de|dorthin}} * {{l|de|hierhin}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:German interrogative adverbs]]
